channel.title: Comments on: The Face of the Ellis Act
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: JV
item.dc:creator: JV
item.description:
My friends at 3616 Marcia Dr are about to leave in the streets or move out of LA. The new developers totally toke two legally medically disable ladies and put them on the streets.
Shame on the politics
item.content:encoded:
My friends at 3616 Marcia Dr are about to leave in the streets or move out of LA.
The new developers totally toke two legally medically disable ladies and put them on the streets.

Shame on the politics

item.title: By: Chris Springer
item.dc:creator: Chris Springer
item.description: I live on Marcia drive. The three tenants ( myself included) are disabled. We have to leave in May. I am completely out of resourses. I’m face homelessness. They are turning it into a TIC . 550k each unit. Watching the real estate agent, “the rental girl," pitch this disgusting thing to perspective buyers is extra torture.
item.content:encoded:
I live on Marcia drive. The three tenants ( myself included) are disabled. We have to leave in May.
I am completely out of resourses. I’m face homelessness.
They are turning it into a TIC . 550k each unit. Watching the real estate agent, “the rental girl,” pitch this disgusting thing to perspective buyers is extra torture.
